Title: Peter Pan
Writer: J.M. Barrie (play), P.J. Hogan (screenplay), Michael Goldenberg (screenplay)
Actors: Jason Isaacs, Jeremy Sumpter, Rachel Hurd-Wood, Lynn Redgrave
Plot: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.
Production: Columbia Pictures Corporation, Red Wagon Productions, Revolution Studios, Universal Pictures, Allied Stars
